<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Story Crooner](/Feats.aspx?ID=2645) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Strix" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=342" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 136 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You're a talented story weaver and use your voice effectively. You are trained in [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12). If you would automatically become trained in Performance, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also gain the Impressive Performance skill feat and gain a +1 circumstance bonus when Performing for an audience of strix.
name: Story Crooner
